name: places/ChIJT5KW8iBawokROTlUY7r9wSc
adrFormatAddress: 338 Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: Igor is literally THE BEST in the business! Worldwide at that! And I would know because I've had shoe markets from South of France to Milan to Moscow fix my shoes. His job is beyond perfect because he adds metal endings to the new soles he puts, he polishes the leather, the Louboutin soles he puts are perhaps better than the original varnish sole, and he repairs any kind of zipper. Also you can buy amazing extras to keep your shoes fresh. Recently I got these boot fillers & I'm obsessed with them!! I highly recommend to anyone in Soho, Fidi, or even out of town. He's done literally hundreds of pairs of my shoes & I travel even from the Hamptons to get my shoes repaired at Express Shoe Repair with Igor - 100%

originalText.text: One of my favorites! These guys know what they’re doing. I stop in on lunch break and get my shoes/boots shined. The woman who does shining is very thorough! Igor repaired my high heels back to (almost) new. I really appreciate that little metal piece he put on the under side of the toe so the front of the stiletto doesn’t dig into the pavement when walking. They are very skilled cobblers and I will continue to refer everyone I can. Igor is super friendly and a pleasure to chat with

originalText.text: Igor was amazing! I really ruin my shoes with my agressive walking and he made them look brand new. He even added a toe plate to combat my agressive walking. I would highly recommend Express Shoe Repair for any of your shoe needs!

text.text: Igor was amazing! I really ruin my shoes with my agressive walking and he made them look brand new. He even added a toe plate to combat my agressive walking. I would highly recommend Express Shoe Repair for any of your shoe needs!

originalText.text: I’ve had several really good experiences here and now am a regular customer.  Igor, the guy who runs the place, shoots you straight and does really good work.  There’s been several times where I bring him a pair of shoes that I think are toast and he makes them look brand new.  There’s actually never been a time where he couldn’t fix my “issue.”  Turnaround time is usually pretty quick, and he charges very fair prices too (especially for the quality of the work).  Would highly recommend giving him a shot.

text.text: I’ve had several really good experiences here and now am a regular customer.  Igor, the guy who runs the place, shoots you straight and does really good work.  There’s been several times where I bring him a pair of shoes that I think are toast and he makes them look brand new.  There’s actually never been a time where he couldn’t fix my “issue.”  Turnaround time is usually pretty quick, and he charges very fair prices too (especially for the quality of the work).  Would highly recommend giving him a shot.

originalText.text:
Prices are just as excellent as the quality of the work.

In the past eight months, I’ve taken every shoe that’s needed a re-sole and/or cleaning to this establishment and have always gotten my money’s worth, in addition to being highly impressed.

The best example is when I gave Igor a pair of very old, severely-worn and oil-stained Sperry Topsiders whose soles were practically nonexistent. He made a custom order to his longtime supplier to get a sole with the perfect color. Within a week, I got them back, and they looked completely brand new. In short, he did the impossible.

Igor knows immediately what to do and will treat you with the utmost respect.

And finally, Express offers both the best and the cheapest shoe shine in the City.

Do yourself and your shoes a favor; go to Igor for all your footwear-related needs.
